modmenu.descriptionTranslation.afkcam: AFK Camera is a client-side Minecraft mod that activates a cinematic camera when the player is AFK.
afkcam.modmenu.title: AFKCam mod Configuration
afkcam.option.modEnabled.desc: Toggles the AFK Camera mod on or off.
afkcam.option.debugLogEnabled.desc: Displays system information in console and log files when enabled. Helpful for resourcepack developers.
afkcam.option.activationAfter.desc: Time (in seconds) before the AFK camera activates after inactivity.
afkcam.option.disableOnDamage.desc: Stops the AFK camera when the player takes damage.
afkcam.option.disableOnDeath.desc: Stops the AFK camera when the player dies.
afkcam.option.loadDefaultAnimation.desc: Automatically loads the default AFK camera animation when the game starts.
afkcam.option.cameraSpeed.desc: Sets the speed at which the camera moves along the route.
afkcam.option.fade.desc: Smoothly fades between camera keyframes for cinematic transitions.
afkcam.option.fadeIn.desc: Time (in seconds) it takes to fade in the camera at the start of a route.
afkcam.option.fadeOut.desc: Time (in seconds) it takes to fade out the camera at the end of a route.
